name: Clarence's Grand Adventure
description:
Clarence's Grand Adventure is a single player action game that takes place in a city full of thieves and twinkie addicts. You must venture through the city to find a way out. 

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow keys - Move
  • G - Punch
  • E - Enter Store
Credits Gary Li

Aliana Campas

Javier Perez

Andrew deBerardinis
Programming, Design, Art, Sound
